inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: known history of Sickle cell disease

inclusion.criterion: Score of 80 or lower on the AdultQLTM 3.0 Sickle Cell Disease Module, or any disease-related complication
inclusion.label: not_met
inclusion.evidence: severe bone pain scored 9 out of 10

inclusion.criterion: Hydroxyurea usage in the last 3 months
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Pregnancy, or refusal to use medically effective birth control if female and sexually active
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of sickle cell crises since childhood, but no indication of pregnancy or current phlebotomy therapy.
